Name: Researchity | Open World Survival Game
About the game: A Strange New Planet You receive a strange signal from a previously unknown planet but when an unexpended solar storm happens, You end up crashing on the planet with little supplies and no way home you have no choice but to continue looking for the source of the signal. The Planet has 4 Region each with a different season (Summer, Spring, Winter, Autumn) Collect, Craft, Survive: Use the resources all around you to survive. Craft all the tools you'll need in order to find the source of the signal. Build you own base: You'll need a base and all sorts of machines to make yourself at home, Make the world your own: You can tame the local wild life, this will make surviving a lot easier. Key Features: Character Thirst, Stamina, Oxygen, Temperature, Health Mechanics, Time of day (Day, Night) Dynamic Weather System Base Building Crafting Mining ores
